HEADLINE: Mahanagar Gas Ltd has informed BSE regarding "Transcript of Earnings Conference call on Unaudited Financial Results for the quarter and half year ended September 30, 2016".
Transcript of Earnings Conference call on Unaudited Financial Results for the quarter and half year ended September 30, 2017.

Mahanagar Gas Ltd has informed BSE that an Earnings conference call on Unaudited Financial Results for the quarter and nine months ended December 31, 2016 was held on February 13, 2017.

The Company has submitted to BSE the transcript of the aforesaid Earnings Conference call.
